posts.title: How to lay your own domain?
posts.description: Domain expansion is the pinnacle of all jujutsu techniques. A stronger domain will overwhelm the weaker one in a domain battle.

posts.title: Feeling sad about Yuuji's departure...
posts.description: My beloved student Yuuji lost his life during fight with a special grade curse. Everybody has to learn to become strong. At least, Nanamin is with me. And Utahime.

posts.title: Night of Demon Parade
posts.description: I will unleash a hundred curses using my Maximum Uzumaki...a Night of Demon Parade on Shinjuku and Kyoto. Let's curse each other. Satoru...I hope you are ready my best friend!

posts.title: Do I have talent to beat special grades?
posts.description: Why did Sukuna say that? What is my talent? Gojo Sensei please help me discover my talent. Maki-san I think I can do it. I can become strong.

posts.title: Feeling bored...might as well train a Shikigami.
posts.description: When I am bored, me and my trained Shikigamis go into an exorcising ritual to train more Shikigamis. I need to tame all 10. Nobody has been able to do so...it's very exciting. I don't know who my father is though.
